players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Alice, why are you so sure Charlie was mafia? We haven't had any discussion yet."
Bob: "Alice is lying. I investigated her last night and she is the mafioso. Diana is confirmed town."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. My investigation confirmed it. Diana is town. Vote Alice."
Diana: "I believe Bob is the detective and his investigation confirms Alice is mafia. I'm voting Alice."
